thread.section_title: MHW Bike-House GmbH Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von MHW Bike-House GmbH | www.mhw-bike.de
thread.title: A. Burak Erbora
thread.title_full: MHW Bike-House GmbH bewertet von A. Burak Erbora

author: A. Burak Erbora
title: A. Burak Erbora
text:
The best customer service by far. Thank you for sending me spare parts for free even though it was my own fault they got broken.
It is always a tedious experience when buying something expansive online. MHW turns that experience into a very smooth, trusting shopping experience. They respond to your questions very clearly and quickly, and with valuable personnal recommendations. When you are done with your shopping, expect your items by your door as quickly as humanly possible too.
Simply, the best.
